Our Philosophy: Your Crew, Our Care

We like to be your window to the crew market in the Philippines and customize our operations to suit your needs.

  • For each of our Principals we develop and maintain a dedicated pool of Seafarers.
  • We strongly believe loyalty pays off in the long run in terms of lower recruitment & trainig costs and more experienced crew. We willassist you in staying abreast of the market and advise you how to invest in measures enhancing crew loyalty.
  • We can advise on, or execute for you a cadet program aimed at making you self sufficient in Officers in the future.
  • We can assist in setting up a development program for your crew with a proper career path for each rank. We can execute and monitoryour training policy or advise you on training venues and training development.
  • We will customize our services around your specific needs representing your Company towards the crew and implement your policiesand programs.
  • We can advise you on prevailing market conditions and ensuring Terms & Conditions stay abreast of market developments. We canassist in negotiations with local Unions if applicable.

We are duly licensed by POEA and MLC accredited by Bureau Veritas and Lloyds Register. We are ISO 9001:2008 certified through UKAS.
